com.owlike.genson.annotation

Annotation Type HandleClassMetadata


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Inherited
 @Documented
public @interface HandleClassMetadata
    Annotated Serializer/Deserializer/Converter with @HandleClassMetadata indicate that they will handle @class metadata during serialization and deserialization. By default it is handled by the library in ClassMetadataConverter. Default converters from DefaultConverters annotated with @HandleClassMetadata do not serialize type information nor do they use it during deserialization. For security reasons class metadata is disabled by default. To enable it GensonBuilder.useClassMetadata(boolean) GensonBuilder.useClassMetadata(true)}
    Author:
    eugen
    See Also:
    ClassMetadataConverter, Genson.Builder.setWithClassMetadata(true)

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean deserialization 
      boolean serialization
      Set to false if you want to let the existing mechanism handle the class metadata for you.

    • Element Detail

      • serialization

        public abstract boolean serialization
        Set to false if you want to let the existing mechanism handle the class metadata for you.
        Default:
        true

      • deserialization

        public abstract boolean deserialization
        See Also:
        serialization()
        Default:
        true
